attributes.action: To ask SWTRA to investigate improvements to the Pwll Trap junction on the A40
attributes.additional_details: After several accidents, this junction needs immediate investigation to the safety of its current layout and lighting. Currently cars have to stop on an open carriageway to wait to turn. Cars often don't see this, especially at night and drive into the car waiting to turn.
attributes.background: To ask the South Wales truck road agency (SWTRA) to look at improving the junction at Pwll Trap on the A40 to make it safer

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/
